title: Roman amphitheater at Deva
description: The second-century A.D. Roman amphitheater at Deva Victrix (modern Chester, England) was the largest military amphitheater in Britain.

properties.description: The Roman amphitheater at Deva was the largest military amphitheater in Britain. Location based on OpenStreetMap.
properties.title: OSM location of Roman amphitheater

properties.description: Coordinates following GeoHack, verified in Google Earth 2016.
properties.title: Imagery location of Centerpoint of amphitheatre
